title: Sidewall
description: a) On light gray-green ground, large-scale repeating pattern of ragged-petaled pink poppies, swirling gray-green and (reserved) light gray-green leaves, light brown stems with briars, brown in-fill; b) Same, on emerald green ground, with bright red and pink poppies, bright chartreuse and (reserved) emerald leaves, brown stems, black in-fill.
name: Sidewall
